summary: A young, lonely, emotionally challenged teenage girl finds solace in burying dead animals after the sudden traumatic death of a childhood friend ten years earlier.
cast: Hayley Mills|Annette Crosbie|Laurence Naismith|Geoffrey Bayldon|Pauline Jameson|Norman Bird|June Ellis|Hamilton Dyce|Judith Furse|Anne Blake|Jack Bligh|Michael Nightingale|Wyn Jones|Dafydd Havard|Cyril Chamberlain|George Selway|Fred Ferris|Grace Arnold|Margaret Lacey|Kay Lyell|Ian McShane|Rachel Thomas|Gerald Lawson|Jacqueline Pearce|Alan Lake|Irene Bradshaw|Talfryn Thomas|Hira Talfrey|Richard Davies|Len Jones|Roland Starling|Jessica Hobbs|Susan Chatham|Robin Crewe|Lola Payne|Nicola Street|Stephen Salt|Joyce Mayhead|Anne Somerset|Charles Wood|Catriona Street|Mandy Woollen|Andrew Wicks|Hamlet|Jimmy Charters
title: Sky West and Crooked
